channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Visual Studio Code Live Share extension
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Visual Studio Code Live Share extension

item.title: CVE-2020-1343|2024-08-04T06:32:01.217Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20visual%20studio%20code%20live%20share%20extension
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in Visual Studio Code Live Share Extension when it exposes tokens in plain text, aka 'Visual Studio Code Live Share Information Disclosure Vulnerability'.
